 Double restricted existential quantification.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1995.)
statement:
r2ex $p |- ( E. x e. A E. y e. B ph <-> E. x E. y ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) /\ ph ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d x y $.
